articles.title: Udaipur Tailor Killer Has Pak Links, Say Cops; 5 More Detained
articles.description: One of the killers of Udaipur tailor Kanhaiya Lal had links with Pak-based terror groups and had 10 Pak numbers on his phone, sources said. Five more have been detained in the case, which is being handled by the National Investigation Agency.
articles.content: <li>One of the accused, Mohammad Riyas Ansari, was in contact with Pakistan-based terror groups. Gulam Gaus had visited Karachi in 2014. Before killing Kanhaiya Lal, they had watched many ISIS videos… [+2213 chars]
